summary: Changes Eorlund Gray-Mane at the Skyforge to look like Dark Soul\'s Andre of Astora.
descriptionHtml: Changes Eorlund Gray-Mane at the Skyforge to look like Dark Souls\' Andre of Astora. Since Astora is not a known place in the world of the Elder Scrolls, I changed Eorlund\'s name to Andre of Atmora (the continent north of Tamriel where the Nords are said to hail from, including Talos and Ysgramor).
author: Auxiliary Jarol
